COMMAND.NAME: fromfile
COMMAND.SUMMARY: Return true if a buffer is associated with a file
COMMAND.PARAMETER: bufferName The unique name of an e93 buffer.
COMMAND.DESCRIPTION: Return a boolean value that tells if bufferName is associated with a file. A buffer is associated with a file, if e93 has read the buffer from a file, or has done a savebufferas.
COMMAND.STATUS:
This command will return an error in the following cases:
bufferName is not provided.
bufferName is not an e93 buffer.
